benefits.name: Ability Score Increase
effects: Choose one ability in which you lack saving throw proficiency. Increase the chosen ability score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

benefits.name: Saving Throw Proficiency
effects: You gain saving throw proficiency with the chosen ability.
